verses.roman:
śeṣa ye rahila prabhura dvādaśa vatsara
kṛṣṇera viyoga-sphūrti haya nirantara

synonyms: śeṣa—at the end; ye—those; rahila—remained; prabhura—of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dvādaśa vatsara—twelve years; kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; viyoga—of separation; sphūrti—manifestation; haya—is; nirantara—always.
translation: During His last twelve years, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu always manifested all the symptoms of ecstasy in separation from Kṛṣṇa.
